com.ericdaugherty.mail.server.services.smtp
Class MIMEConstants

java.lang.Object
  com.ericdaugherty.mail.server.services.smtp.MIMEConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
MIMEProcessor, MIMESender
public class MIMEConstants
extends java.lang.Object

A number of final int and String values to be used implicitly when handling mails.

Author:
Andreas Kyrmegalos
